page.title: 07N.S.TOURIST TOWN
page.content: There are plenty hotels,guest houses and bed and breakfast establishments in the area to stay in.In the town there are gift shops,tourist information,a museum,indoor swimming pool,tennis courts,bowling(indoor and outdoor)and a cinema.The museum is in an old church.It is roped off into different sections.One part has the stuff that would be in an old nursery, another is a kitchen and so on.The swimming pool is in the High School and is open on Saturday and Sunday afternoons and in the school holidays it is open all the time.
